pma:database.name: formation-opendata
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `t_institution` ( `uid` char(9) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `slug` varchar(110) NOT NULL, `url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `created_at` datetime NOT NULL, `edited_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp(), PRIMARY KEY (`uid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

table.name: t_institution
table.column: AECD - Association pour l'Education Cognitive et le Développement

table.name: t_institution
table.column: DNDC - DIGITAL NUMÉRIQUE DOMOTIQUE COMMUNICATION - OF / CFA
